name: Ext_R4B_ServiceRequest_orderDetail
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.ServiceRequest.orderDetail for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ServiceRequest.orderDetail from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ServiceRequest|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Additional details and instructions about the how the services are to be delivered.   For example, and order for a urinary catheter may have an order detail for an external or indwelling catheter, or an order for a bandage may require additional instructions specifying how the bandage should be applied.
element.comment: `ServiceRequest.orderDetail` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.orderDetail`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.orderDetail` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.orderDetail`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `ServiceRequest.orderDetail` maps to R5 `ServiceRequest.orderDetail`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Codified order entry details which are based on order context.
